articles.title: Drawing set for a Powerball jackpot that has ballooned to $1.8 billion
articles.description:
The game's terrible odds of 1 in 292.2 million are designed to generate big jackpots and ever-larger prizes. There are three drawings each week.

The post Drawing set for a Powerball jackpot that has ballooned to $1.8 billion appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Powerball jackpot reaches $1.8 billion, drawing scheduled for upcoming week.
Odds of winning remain at 1 in 292.2 million, impacting ticket sales.
Local businesses may see increased foot traffic as residents purchase tickets.

articles.title: Carroll hits 30th home run and Diamondbacks pull away late to beat Red Sox 10-5
articles.description:
Boston has lost two straight and is a half-game behind the New York Yankees for second place in the AL East.

The post Carroll hits 30th home run and Diamondbacks pull away late to beat Red Sox 10-5 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox lost 10-5 to the Diamondbacks on September 6.
Corbin Carroll hit his 30th home run during the game.
Boston is now half a game behind the Yankees in AL East standings.

articles.title: 10 bold predictions for the 2025 Patriots
articles.description:
The Patriots need a strong season from Drake Maye if they have any hope of playing postseason football.

The post 10 bold predictions for the 2025 Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' success hinges on quarterback Drake Maye's performance in the 2025 season.
Predictions suggest a challenging season ahead for the team and its fans.
Postseason hopes for Boston depend on Maye's ability to lead effectively.
